PostToolUse.name: format-on-edit
PostToolUse.description: Run cargo fmt on edited Rust files

hooks.command: cargo fmt -- $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS 2>/dev/null || cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && cargo fmt 2>/dev/null || true

PostToolUse.name: check-on-edit
PostToolUse.description: Run cargo check after Rust file edits

hooks.command: cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && cargo check --message-format=short 2>&1 | grep -E '^error' | head -10 || true

PostToolUse.name: clippy-on-edit
PostToolUse.description: Run clippy for lint warnings after edits

hooks.command: cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && cargo clippy --message-format=short 2>&1 | grep -E '^(warning|error)' | head -10 || true

PreToolUse.name: pre-commit-quality-gate
PreToolUse.description: Full quality check before git commits

hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'git commit'; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && cargo fmt -- --check && cargo clippy -- -D warnings && cargo test; fi
